data.title: Chelsea join Daniel Wass chase
data.meta_description: Chelsea have reportedly joined the race for the services of Evian star Daniel Wass, according to Le 10 Sport.
data.text:
Chelsea have reportedly joined the race for the services of Evian star Daniel Wass, according to Le 10 Sport.

The Denmark international has been in top form in Ligue 1 this season, and has attracted interest from Marseille and few other French side in recent weeks.

Le 10 Sport claims Wass will be available for a nominal fee in January given his existing contract is due to expire at the end of the season.

The report adds that the Blues will make a move of their own for the player's services in the New Year.

The talented winger has scored 7 goals in 14 league games for the club this season.
